attributes.action: Councils to give high priorty to ex armed forces for social housing
attributes.background: Some ex armed forces are living on our streets. They have fought for our country, witnessed horrible things, their lives have drastically changed. Some come home and end up on the streets. All ex forces deserve to be a high priorty for social housing, so our country gives back to them.

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107702

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
